definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="1142" y="344"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_replace_sphere" inline="false"><comment pinned="false" h="114" w="249">This block represents a blob feature that replaces netherrack with blackstone, like the ones that generate in the Nether.This feature should be generated during the UNDERGROUND_DECORATION stage</comment><value name="targetState"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.AIR</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block being replaced (in this case netherrack)</comment></block></value><value name="newState"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GarsaleVines</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that will be placed by the feature (in this case blackstone)</comment></block></value><value name="radius"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">3</field><field name="max">4</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the size of the blob</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate up to 25 blackstone blobs in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">10</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each blob horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_height_uniform"><comment pinned="false" h="78" w="191">The blobs have uniform distribution, so they can generate at any height with the same probability.</comment><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_above_bottom"><field name="value">0</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_below_top"><field name="value">0</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter" inline="false"><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_all_of"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><value name="condition0"><block type="block_predicate_not"><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_solid"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="condition1"><block type="block_predicate_solid"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">1</field><field name="z">0</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="block_predicate_would_survive" x="2133" y="562"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GarsaleVines</field></block></value></block><block type="block_predicate_any_of" x="1459" y="753"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><value name="condition1"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">1</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_list"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><field name="block0">CUSTOM:GarsaleLeaves</field><field name="block1">CUSTOM:FloweringGarsaleLeaves</field></block></value></block></value></block></xml>
